jobDescription: Thornton Tomasetti provides engineering design, investigation and analysis services to clients worldwide on projects of every size and level of complexity. We are a growing 1200+ person firm with practices in the following disciplines: Structural Engineering, Forensics, Applied Science, Renewal, Property Loss Consulting, Construction Engineering, Protective Design, Facade Engineering, Sustainability and Transportation. We work on landmarks to exhibitions from the historic to the high performing while balancing multiple objectives which include form, function, schedule, sustainability, constructability and budget. At our core, TALENT is the center of our business.  Thornton Tomasetti, Inc., Inc. is seeking a summer intern in our Building Analytics group, a subset of the Sustainability Practice, for the San Francisco office. This person shall support our team’s effort to advance energy analytics in our project work and tool development. This person is a graduate student or recent graduate with a degree related to energy engineering, and/or architecture are preferred.
